casebody.data:
Jonathan and Abbey WEBER, H/W, Petitioners
v.
BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF the LAUREL OAKS ASSOCIATION and Mid Atlantic Management, Respondents No. 855 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. June 5, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 5th day of June, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
